column4: ant: okay thank you so much for your help . i'll go look up crontab later. for now, my head is spinning... @__@ i really did a lot of configuring in ubuntu and learning about command lines in the previous 2 days.
i would try a different flavour, like mint
every flavour is different, different drivers etc, it might just be a driver issue, hey mint is a live / install cd, so you try before install
